item.title: Why libraries are more than just books?
item.dc:creator: Melissa Hunter
item.description: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a…
item.content:encoded:
A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.
– Norman Cousins

A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.
